name: Leap Theory
description:
Want that sweet nostalgia of older games, but with a fun stylish feel? Well then this is the game for you! Travel through space and unlock cool abilities in the 5-8 minutes of game play provided! Have fun!

This game was made for the Git Hub Game Off. The time provided to create the game was a month. In this game, the friendly narrator provides our player with the ability to leap/warp through space using the leap drive.
